column5: It's a sad day around the Bush Guys' place as the fuel conditioner went in for the last fishin trip of the season.  went out for smallies with my son-----beauty day---finally got a drop shot rig to work for me.  Gotta go cry in my beer now---(PS remember to vote)  Here he is with a couple from today---Happy Thanksgiving  Bushart
Some real nice looking smallies there dude.
There for a sec... I thought this was a political type thread!  Very noice Tiny Mooth Basses there Bubba!!!  If ya just gotta have a fishin' fix, come on down to 'Bama and I'll take ya out!
Some serious nice looking bronze back bushart  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Sweet smallies bushart. You gotta love them when they colour up like that.

Thanks for the invite---I've also got some boys from Florida that I guided for deer wanting me to come down---I may make it some year. Actually if your on one of those Lakair Pilgramages you could travel a little east and I could take you out on some different water (Ottawa Valley).  These fish did not come from Lake Simcoe, Couch, Erie, or the other bodies most connect with big smallies but from right near my home. Also if you guys get together around this time of year--Huge Smallies are extremely predictable and easy to catch---This picture was only 2 fish we photo'd most we caught were in this size class and one hawger in the 5 plus class.  Bushart
Too bad you didn't have longer arms.......  LOL
Some real monster smallies for sure !!!.  ..well done..cheers
